spec_data.Name: nuvola-app-bbc-iplayer
spec_data.Description:
Integration of BBC iPlayer into your linux desktop via Nuvola Player.

This is a beta release: support for HTML5 Media Source Extensions (MSE) is new
to WebKitGtk and may be still incomplete. Most BBC content works, most of the
time, but not all. In those cases you can still use the Flash player, but Nuvola
will be unable to detect or control playing state.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 01 Oct 2017 04:24:26 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: BBC iPlayer plugin for Nuvola Player
